General.Name: PT Berkah Beton Sadaya Tbk
General.Description: PT Berkah Beton Sadaya Tbk, an industrial supporting infrastructure company, engages in the production and sale of ready-mix and precast concrete products in Indonesia. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Subang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Sembung Pagaden KM 9.5, Subang, Indonesia, 41251
